title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{\left(12x-6x^2\right) \left(x^2+11x+24\right)}{\left(x^2+8x\right) \left(x^2-4\right)}$$

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{\left(12x-6x^2\right) \left(x^2+11x+24\right)}{\left(x^2+8x\right) \left(x^2-4\right)}=\frac{-6x\left(x-2\right) \left(x+8\right) \left(x+3\right)}{x\left(x+8\right) \left(x+2\right) \left(x-2\right)}=\frac{-6\left(x+3\right)}{x+2}$$
